text:
I don't see __CSVRead mentioned on the page http://jmeter.apache.org/usermanual/build-adv-web-test-plan.html. I see 'next' mentioned in http://jmeter.apache.org/usermanual/functions.html#__CSVRead.

It may not be clear, but 'next' will proceed to the next line and returns no value.

Do you have an opinion on how to make the documentation clearer? Patches are always welcome :)

PS. It is better to attach the plain csv and jmx files as they can be viewed directly in bugzilla.
